mapper.select: SELECT iam_label.* FROM iam_role_label LEFT JOIN iam_label ON iam_role_label.label_id = iam_label.id AND iam_label.type = 'role' WHERE iam_role_label.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT * FROM iam_label l WHERE 1=1
AND l.type LIKE concat(concat('%',#{label.type}), '%')
AND l.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{label.name}), '%')
AND l.FD_LEVEL LIKE concat(concat('%',#{label.level}), '%')
AND l.description LIKE concat(concat('%',#{label.description}), '%')
AND l.name LIKE concat(concat('%','gitlab'), '%')
AND l.name not LIKE concat(concat('%','gitlab'), '%')

SELECT DISTINCT il.* FROM iam_user iu JOIN iam_member_role imr ON iu.id = imr.member_id JOIN iam_role_label irl ON imr.role_id = irl.role_id JOIN iam_label il ON irl.label_id = il.id WHERE imr.member_type = 'user' AND iu.id = #{id}

#{item}
